verses.verse: Then <WG1161> he called <WG4779> his twelve <WG1427> disciples <WG3101> together, <WG4779> and gave <WG1325> them power <WG1411> and authority <WG1849> over <WG1909> all <WG3956> devils, <WG1140> and to cure <WG2323> diseases. <WG3554>
And he sent <WG649> them to preach <WG2784> the kingdom <WG932> of God, <WG2316> and to heal <WG2390> the sick. <WG770>

And he said <WG2036> to them, Take <WG142> nothing <WG3367> for your <WG3588> journey, <WG3598> neither <WG3383> staves, <WG4464> nor <WG3383> money, <WG4082> neither <WG3383> bread, <WG740> neither <WG3383> money; <WG694> neither <WG3383> have <WG2192> two <WG1417> coats <WG5509> apiece. <WG303>
And whatever <WG3739> <WG302> house <WG3614> you enter <WG1525> into, <WG1519> there <WG1563> abide, <WG3306> and there <WG1564> depart. <WG1831>

And whoever <WG3745> <WG302> will not receive <WG1209> you, when you go <WG1831> out of that city, <WG4172> shake <WG660> off <WG660> the very <WG2532> dust <WG2868> from your <WG5216> feet <WG4228> for a testimony <WG3142> against <WG1909> them.
And they departed, <WG1831> and went <WG1330> through <WG2596> the towns, <WG2968> preaching <WG2097> the gospel, <WG2097> and healing <WG2323> every <WG3837> where. <WG3837>

Now <WG1161> Herod <WG2264> the tetrarch <WG5076> heard <WG191> of all <WG3956> that was done <WG1096> by him: and he was perplexed, <WG1280> because <WG1223> that it was said <WG3004> of some, <WG5100> that John <WG2491> was risen <WG1453> from the dead; <WG3498>

And the apostles, <WG652> when they were returned, <WG5290> told <WG1334> him all <WG3745> that they had done. <WG4160> And he took <WG3880> them, and went <WG5298> aside <WG5298> privately <WG2596> <WG2398> into <WG1519> a desert <WG2048> place <WG5117> belonging to the city <WG4172> called <WG2564> Bethsaida. <WG966>

And the people, <WG3793> when they knew <WG1097> it, followed <WG190> him: and he received <WG1209> them, and spoke <WG2980> to them of the kingdom <WG932> of God, <WG2316> and healed <WG2390> them that had <WG2192> need <WG5532> of healing. <WG2322>

And when the day <WG2250> began <WG756> to wear <WG2827> away, then <WG1161> came <WG4334> the twelve, <WG1427> and said <WG2036> to him, Send <WG630> the multitude <WG3793> away, <WG630> that they may go <WG565> into <WG1519> the towns <WG2968> and country <WG68> round <WG2943> about, <WG2945> and lodge, <WG2647> and get <WG2147> victuals: <WG1979> for we are here <WG5602> in a desert <WG2048> place. <WG5117>

For they were about <WG5616> five <WG4000> thousand <WG4000> men. <WG435> And he said <WG2036> to his disciples, <WG3101> Make <WG2625> them sit <WG2625> down <WG2625> by fifties <WG4004> in a company. <WG2828>
And they did <WG4160> so, <WG3779> and made <WG347> them all <WG537> sit <WG347> down. <WG347>

And they did eat, <WG5315> and were all <WG3956> filled: <WG5526> and there was taken <WG142> up of fragments <WG2801> that remained <WG4052> to them twelve <WG1427> baskets. <WG2894>

And it came <WG1096> to pass, as he was alone <WG2651> praying, <WG4336> his disciples <WG3101> were with him: and he asked <WG1905> them, saying, <WG3004> Whom <WG5101> say <WG3004> the people <WG3793> that I am? <WG1511>

And he straightly charged <WG2008> them, and commanded <WG3853> them to tell <WG2036> no <WG3367> man <WG3367> that thing;

For whoever <WG3739> <WG302> will <WG2309> save <WG4982> his life <WG5590> shall lose <WG622> it: but whoever <WG3739> <WG302> will lose <WG622> his life <WG5590> for my sake, <WG1752> the same <WG3778> shall save <WG4982> it.

For whoever <WG3739> <WG302> shall be ashamed <WG1870> of me and of my words, <WG3056> of him shall the Son <WG5207> of man <WG444> be ashamed, <WG1870> when <WG3752> he shall come <WG2064> in his own glory, <WG1391> and in his Father's, <WG3962> and of the holy <WG40> angels. <WG32>

But I tell <WG3004> you of a truth, <WG230> there be some <WG5100> standing <WG2476> here, <WG5602> which <WG3739> shall not taste <WG1089> of death, <WG2288> till <WG2193> they see <WG1492> the kingdom <WG932> of God. <WG2316>

And as he prayed, <WG4336> the fashion <WG1491> of his countenance <WG4383> was altered, <WG1096> <WG2097> and his raiment <WG2441> was white <WG3022> and glistering. <WG1823>

Who <WG3739> appeared <WG3700> in glory, <WG1391> and spoke <WG3004> of his decease <WG1841> which <WG3739> he should <WG3195> accomplish <WG4137> at <WG1722> Jerusalem. <WG2419>

But Peter <WG4074> and they that were with him were heavy <WG916> with sleep: <WG5258> and when they were awake, <WG1235> they saw <WG1492> his glory, <WG1391> and the two <WG1417> men <WG435> that stood <WG4921> with him.

And it came <WG1096> to pass, as they departed <WG1316> from him, Peter <WG4074> said <WG2036> to Jesus, <WG2424> Master, <WG1988> it is good <WG2570> for us to be here: <WG5602> and let us make <WG4160> three <WG5140> tabernacles; <WG4633> one <WG3391> for you, and one <WG3391> for Moses, <WG3475> and one <WG3391> for Elias: <WG2243> not knowing <WG1492> what <WG3739> he said. <WG3004>
While he thus <WG5023> spoke, <WG3004> there came <WG1096> a cloud, <WG3507> and overshadowed <WG1982> them: and they feared <WG5399> as they entered <WG1525> into <WG1519> the cloud. <WG3507>

And it came <WG1096> to pass, that on <WG1722> the next <WG1836> day, <WG2250> when they were come <WG2718> down <WG2718> from the hill, <WG3735> much <WG4183> people <WG3793> met <WG4876> him.

And I sought <WG1189> your disciples <WG3101> to cast <WG1544> him out; and they could <WG1410> not.

And as he was yet <WG2089> a coming, <WG4334> the devil <WG1140> threw <WG4952> him down, and tare <WG4952> him. And Jesus <WG2424> rebuked <WG2008> the unclean <WG169> spirit, <WG4151> and healed <WG2390> the child, <WG3816> and delivered <WG591> him again <WG591> to his father. <WG3962>

And they were all <WG3956> amazed <WG1605> at <WG1909> the mighty <WG3168> power <WG3168> of God. <WG2316> But while they wondered <WG2296> every <WG3956> one <WG3956> at <WG1909> all <WG3956> things which <WG3739> Jesus <WG2424> did, <WG4160> he said <WG2036> to his disciples, <WG3101>

Then <WG1161> there arose <WG1525> a reasoning <WG1261> among <WG1722> them, which <WG5101> of them should be greatest. <WG3187>

And Jesus <WG2424> said <WG2036> to him, Forbid <WG2967> him not: for he that is not against <WG2596> us is for us.

And it came <WG1096> to pass, when <WG1722> <WG3588> the time <WG2250> was come <WG4845> that he should be received <WG354> up, he steadfastly <WG4741> set <WG4741> his face <WG4383> to go <WG4198> to Jerusalem, <WG2419>

And sent <WG649> messengers <WG32> before <WG4253> his face: <WG4383> and they went, <WG4198> and entered <WG1525> into <WG1519> a village <WG2968> of the Samaritans, <WG4541> to make <WG2090> ready <WG2090> for him.

And when his disciples <WG3101> James <WG2385> and John <WG2491> saw <WG1492> this, they said, <WG2036> Lord, <WG2962> will <WG2309> you that we command <WG2036> fire <WG4442> to come <WG2597> down <WG2597> from heaven, <WG3772> and consume <WG355> them, even <WG2532> as Elias <WG2243> did? <WG4160>
But he turned, <WG4762> and rebuked <WG2008> them, and said, <WG2036> You know <WG1492> not what <WG3634> manner <WG3634> of spirit <WG4151> you are of.
For the Son <WG5207> of man <WG444> is not come <WG2064> to destroy <WG622> men's <WG444> lives, <WG5590> but to save <WG4982> them. And they went <WG4198> to another <WG2087> village. <WG2968>

And it came <WG1096> to pass, that, as they went <WG4198> in the way, <WG3598> a certain <WG5100> man said <WG2036> to him, Lord, <WG2962> I will follow <WG190> you wherever <WG3699> <WG302> you go. <WG565>

And Jesus <WG2424> said <WG2036> to him, Foxes <WG258> have <WG2192> holes, <WG5454> and birds <WG4071> of the air <WG3772> have nests; <WG2682> but the Son <WG5207> of man <WG444> has <WG2192> not where <WG4226> to lay <WG2827> his head. <WG2776>
